subject: Order #SSN1754
description_text:
What is the estimated arrival time of this order? I can't find the info in your site 

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer

conversations.body_text: Hi Fernando Carrillo,  Here is the latest tracking information. Please have a look.

Thanks, I got the package. However it is incomplete. The feedback motors did not arrive.
| 
| 
 |

 |
| 
|  | Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback × 1 |

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer
你好，Fernando Carrillo，  我们的订单应该会单独发货，包括踏板和电机。我会让销售团队查询 VAM Pro 的追踪号，并尽快回复您。

Hi Fernando Carrillo,  Your package has shipped, here's the link to your logistics update, Vam Pro has been overloaded with orders which has caused some delays in shipping, sincere apologies!  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSEXI1943887355YQ
